title: Possible Jihn Leak?
body:
what do you guys think about this?

Shoutout to my boy TouchedByShrek

replies.body:
http://imgur.com/3OZz1Er

Here is maybe a leaked ability, note the weird bar under the health bar

Also is that maybe a new Vi skin meaning that the teasers from earlier are also skins?
One more ability: http://i.imgur.com/rxpGTwy.jpg
Jesus Christ that range!
as a jhin main, i can assure you it's not OP and its easily countered plus it's hard to pull it off

>as a jhin main

http://awesomegifs.com/wp-content/uploads/cheers-slow-clap.gif
Stolen from Reddit.

... its a gif ._______.

you find them from everywhere.
lol commented on the wrong comment
lmao
Probably going to be really squishy

As a jhin main i assure you that the combo takes lots of set up skill and resource management and even though it has 100% ad ratio 3 parts to the q and rather small 100% ad ratio shield. its real hard to do cause even though the only gating factor is cdr, cdr gate me so i can only get that 1v5 penta 2 times every 4 games
Just use the common excuse riot gives... Just stay out of their range lolol
seems like  {{champion:21}} +{{champion:51}} ult
As Jhin has that white bar underneath mana, iâ€™m going to assume that once that bar is filled, his next ability will have that ridiculous range.

could be that, something like rengar's second bar, after 4 abilities the next one will have increased range

but in the picture he has 1 slot filled, so i guess its wrong (when rengar use his empowered the bar resets, goes back to 0)

What if it's a bullet system?
He can spend a bar to massivly increase range of an ability.
please don't be a manaless marksmen, please don't be a manaless marksmen, please don't be a manaless marksmen, please don't be a manaless marksmen, please don't be a manaless marksmen...

Gypsy already stated he has mana.
So calm down, there will probably never be a manaless Marksmen/ADC.
{{champion:85}} {{champion:82}} <------ Manaless ADCs
I will end you.
Do you have a Mord radar or something?!
Who needs a radar when you got a magnet?

Things are about to get serious here...
I better burn my pc
Hell you can even see a mana bar in the shot, between the health bar and unique resource bar.
{{champion:41}} alter ego

> [{quoted}](name=OnlyGragasOnlyGG,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QqZTwq1N,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-01-11T11:09:33.724+0000)
>
> {{champion:41}} alter ego

Jhin Gangplank and Illaoi's son confirmed (well they all are... special... so it would fit anyway).
But really, why was he with {{champion:420}} ? This still gives me nightmares.

Illaoi is a strong and independent woman. I can see people being attarcted to that, especially since she isn't exactly ugly either.

Also, considering Bilgewater, there might have been a lot of rum and booze involved....

>Strong and independant
>MUH GANGPLANKU. 

Nope. Visuals don't go with her story, relationships and other stuff. They had to choose between "independent" and "My entire VO and story are about how I miss him". Maybe in the future with new champion, but right now Illaoi fails to fill that role.

You know, one can still be strong and awesome and at the same time think: "Ay, that pirate... I'M GONNA TAP THAT!" and then later be like "Well, that was fun but not again <_<"

Relationships are not that binary btw - not to mention it had a political aspect with it, as Illaoi helped GP rise up in Bilgwater. I can see young GP falling for her at some point tbh.

Also, do you only see those two possibilities? Being completly heartbroken or having no relationship at all? That doesn't even make sense when you bring in Illaoi's ideologic views - she crushes whoever she wants and bangs whoever she wants and there is no one who's going to stop her from doing so. That's the kind of person she is.

Also, didn't you read her extended lore? That piece titled "The Burden" is entirely about these two.

I imagine that there are a variety of reasons.

It would probably be good politically and physically for both of them.

GP is a pirate king and does what he wants.
I see Illaoi as a supporter of a hedonistic lifestyle, and does what she want with who she wants (as long as they are worthy).

Pirate by day.

Painter by moonlight.

> [{quoted}](name=A Superb Villain,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QqZTwq1N,comment-id=000b0002,timestamp=2016-01-11T12:36:32.372+0000)
>
> Pirate by day.
> 
> Painter by moonlight.

Never running from a team fight
He is the one named star Guardian  gangplank
IN THE NAME OF THE ORANGE, I SHALL PUNISH YOU!

> [{quoted}](name=Kyoki Shinkuro,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QqZTwq1N,comment-id=000b000200000000,timestamp=2016-01-11T14:11:23.962+0000)
>
> IN THE NAME OF THE ORANGE, I SHALL PEEL YOU!
But Gangplank's metal arm is his left arm. In this picture Jhin is showed in a mirror so in reality it's his right arm.

Does he own 2 types of gun? Pistol and Rifle.

And his left shoulder. I think it looks like ..... another head.
Jihn: the champ for those who want to get a head in lane.
..... This is why we can't have nice things .....
Get your head in the game
If they're making him deformed instead of another generic pretty boy, I'll be quite pleased :P
For someone obsessed with beauty and perfection, it would certainly explain the mask.
Exactly.

Does anyone see the petals and smoke butterflies from Sona and Zed's thingies? That's pretty cool. I can't seem to find Garen's and Vi's hints in there.

Edit: Okay I found Vi's. It's the sparks coming of the bullet and I think Garen's is just the cracked mirror.
His color scheme is similar to Fiora.
His shoulders and left arm remind me of {{champion:112}} .

See, here's where I know this is fake: in the trailer, Jhin shot with his ***left arm***. So... while that's some nice fan art, it's not a leak. And his left hand had black leather gloves, not a robot arm. D:

Also, a lot of the engravings on the mask are missing or in the wrong place.

It really is a nice piece of art though. Looks like a splash! So 9/10 on that.
But if that's his reflection in a mirror, it is his left hand that is holding a gun. Mask does seem somewhat different tho.
its a mirror
He might be a transforming champ like jayce. Maybe one mode is pistol stance and the other is rifle stance with an ammo system.

> [{quoted}](name=BasedJarvan420,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QqZTwq1N,comment-id=001e,timestamp=2016-01-11T16:30:33.669+0000)
>
> He might be a transforming champ like jayce. Maybe one mode is pistol stance and the other is rifle stance with an ammo system.

Gyspy said he only has "one gun ... technically" which is probably a hint at something fancy.
